options: ['To watch the animals do all kinds of things.', 'To give the animals something to eat.', 'To touch the animals you like.', 'To go near to the animals.']
questions: What can we do in the zoo?
article: Come and see the Indian elephants and the new tigers form Northeast of China. The beautiful birds from England are ready to sing songs for you, and the monkeys from Mount Emei will be happy to talk to you. The lovely dogs from Australia want to laugh at you. Sichuan pandas will play balls for you. The giraffes from Africaare waiting to look down on you. Keep the zoo clean. Do not touch, feed or go near to the animals.
